SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

com.coronis
Class Config

java.lang.Object
  com.coronis.Config

public class Config
extends java.lang.Object

The Config class is a class used to easily manage a hashtable of configuration parameters. It is mainly used to the lack of Property class support in J2ME implementation of the eWON. It is also used to store and share global attributes for the application like the logger.

The format of a configuration file is the following :
-----------------------------------------------------

dailycall.hour=0
dailycall.min=5
sitename=Dapesco1
modules=wth1,wth2,wfl3
repeaters=wtk1,wtk2
wth1.type=wavetherm
wth1.frequency=15
wth1.id=051906302D69
wth2.type=wavetherm
wth2.frequency=15
wth2.id=0519063028B5
wfl3.id=051606304A44
wfl3.type=waveflow
wfl3.frequency=15
wtk1.id=051606304A44
wtk1.type=wavetalk
wtk2.id=051606304A44
wtk2.type=wavetalk
#wfl4.id=051606304A42
#wfl4.type=waveflow
#wfl4.frequency=15
ftp.host=10.0.0.2
ftp.login=login
ftp.pzd=password
ftp.port=21
keep.days=5
debug.coronis=1
debug.all=1

-----------------------------------------------------

Comment lines starts with a #.

A split method has been added in order to be able to split java String. This J2ME version does not have an implementation for String.split().

Copyright : Dipole Consulting SPRL 2008

load

public void load(java.io.InputStream inputStream)
Load configuration from a property file. ! Because J2ME for eWON has no java.util.Properties, we read a file formated as a property file into a HashTable

Parameters:
inputStream -

getRepeaterArray

public WaveTalk[] getRepeaterArray()
                            throws ConfigException
Returns an array with the repeaters defined in the config. If config contains the key repeaters, the list of repeaters declared in this key is loaded. Otherwise all the config is parsed trying to find all the available wavetalk modules

Returns:
WaveTalk[]
Throws:
ConfigException

getModuleArray

public Module[] getModuleArray(WavePort wpt,
                               WaveTalk[] repeaters)
                        throws ConfigException
Returns an array of module based on the content of the config. If the config contains a "modules" key, the list of modules name in this key is loaded. Otherwise, the full config is parsed searching for modules.

Parameters:
wpt - : a WavePort instance
repeaters - : an array listing the available repeaters
Returns:
Module[] : an array of module
Throws:
ConfigException
